reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's style, with one noting its A-line design, and appreciate its fit, with one mentioning it falls right at the knees. The dress is comfortable, soft, and true to size, particularly suitable for wearing with knee-high boots. Customers find it flattering, complimenting their shape, and one mentions it's perfect for curvy women. The color accuracy receives positive feedback, with one customer de

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress!!
items.body: Dress is so soft and comfy! I bought a large and it fit great. Itâ€™s the perfect length to wear with knee high boots for a cute fall look! For reference I am 5â€™3â€ and weigh ~190lbs. Read more
items.author: Cecily Coleman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Absolutely darling dress! Perfect for fall and cooler weather. I needed a warmer type dress for church. This fits just right and the material is so soft. It is just warm enough without being too warm for me (with my broken thermostat). It washed up great. There is a bit of give to the fabric. The color is nice and I also have it in the purple. Read more
items.author: Patti Such

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress!
items.body: This is the best dress! The size is true to your normal size. I am a petite lady and it fits well length wise. The fabric is soft and comfortable. The square neck cut falls perfect around the neck. It is the most comfortable dress! Even has pockets! Win- Win! Read more
items.author: Dr W Bryan Camp

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute But a Little Sheer
items.body: I bought this dress in the creamish-tan color and the darker brown, and I love them both. They are super comfortable, have a float flirty skirt, and are the perfect length. They seem well made, but the fabric is definitely a little bit sheer. The darker brown one hides undergarments better, but the lighter colored one shows everything, so be prepared to wear a slip or to wear nude colored underthings if you get that one. The dress does have pockets, which I find myself putting my hands into a lot, but I likely wouldnâ€™t actually use them to carry anything because of how lightweight the fabric is and how it would end up pulling the dress down and making it look weird on one side. Overall, they are cute dresses and I have worn them each several times already, just plan for the sheerness! Read more
items.author: D. Decker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars MUST BUY FOR FALL
items.body: One of the best fall dresses I've ever worn! Very light, breathable, comfy, and very flattering fit. For reference, I'm 115lbs, 5'3 and ordered a small ðŸ™‚ I've bought multiple colors. Style, quality, and color is amazing. Can wear with leggings or without. Definitely recommend ðŸ‘Œ Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: Very nice material. Soft but also thick. Color is gorgeous. Iâ€™m 5â€™ 3â€ and the bottom seam does fall on the middle of my butt my no biggy. Very cute and love the pockets! Read more
items.author: Amy Gerber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfortable dress!
items.body: Love this dress! It is so cute on and very soft and comfortable. It is lightweight but I prefer it lightweight as I get hot easily. I'm actually about to buy it in two more colors. I can usually wear a small or medium in most clothes depending on brand. I went with a small on this one and it fit perfectly. I am glad I went with a small instead of medium, because it is just slightly longer on my short legs. I'm 5 feet tall and weigh about 140 lbs. Read more
items.author: TS

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Style and fit.
items.body: This dress is true to size. It's so casual. One can wear this for different occasions. I wore it for Thanksgiving dinner with a pair of knee-high boots. The material is super soft and stretchy. The material is on the thin side. But with a room full of people, it was perfect. (I got the brown dress). Read more
items.author: Kim M. Masaitis

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Marine Blue, Pretty Arm Green, Cream Green, Blue, Burgundy, Dark Grey, Grey Blue, Apricot, Hot Pink, Black, Coffee, Light Blue, Khaki, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
